h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
img_above_text:
# Mind Core
Mind Cores, like Blood of the Iron Bull, are one of the rarest Crafting Materials in Black Myth: Wukong and it is vital that you find as many of them as possible to be able to provide passive upgrades to your stats, health, damage, and defense.
## Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
Below, you can find a list of all the Mind Core locations in the game's first two chapters:
### Mind Core Location 9
The next Mind Core is actually obtained by speaking with Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple \- Cellar Shrine area.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically at the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar Shrine area. It shows a character standing in a dimly lit temple with an option to "Offer Incense" at a shrine. This image is associated with the location of a Mind Core, a rare crafting material crucial for upgrading stats, health, damage, and defense in the game. The context suggests that players can obtain the Mind Core by interacting with Xu Dog in this area.
